bibl.title: Royal Decree of November 12, 198 B.C. (?) on Sale of Egyptians Enslaved in Unrest.
bibl.note: Letter (unpublished) by the Dioiketes Athenodoros to the agoranomoi instructing them to register the sale of a slave. This document illuminates the Egyptian revolt.

bibl.title: Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III

bibl.seg: Koenen Ludwig, Royal Decree of November 12, 198 B.C. (?) on Sale of Egyptians Enslaved in Unrest (PMich. Inv. 6947).
Atti del XVII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. III (Napoli, 1984) pp. 915-916.
Letter (unpublished) by the Dioiketes Athenodoros to the agoranomoi instructing them to register the sale of a slave. This document illuminates the Egyptian revolt.
